interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: RegenFX Skincare Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Green Tea Extracts and Hyaluronic Acid. Potent Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Treatment, Skin Tightening, and Collagen Stimulation. Net Wt 1.0 oz/ 30 ml Review Date: 2015/12/30 Store: RegenFX Skincare Product Description: ["Reset the clock and recover your skin's youth with this nourishing, sculpting, and firming cream that is infused with an energetic blend of essential oils. Formulated with RegenFX complex, this anti aging cream helps restore skins natural younger form, addressing and reversing sagging skin and loss of volume, elasticity, density and wrinkles. This all-in-one highly active energetic anti aging moisturizer focuses on cellular regeneration, lifting and wrinkles with the latest targeted peptide complexes. A joyous and energetic blend of proprietary ingredients that creates a therapeutic aromatherapy effect."] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7 inches; 1.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FXMOIS-1', 'UPC': '641061984320', 'Manufacturer': 'Eureka Brands LLC'} Review Text: This moisturizer arrived with a defective pump top dispenser. I tried running it under hot water and still couldn't get it to work. I understand that problems happen from time to time and contacted the seller to kindly inform them of my problem with this item. No response. I contacted the seller twice more over the next four days to arrange for an exchange and still have never heard one single reply.
< Discount provided for evaluation and review Review Title: Defective product Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gio Naturals Organic Moroccan Argan Oil, 4 oz - 100% Pure and USDA Certified for Face, Hair, Skin and Nails {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2.2 x 2.1 inches; 8.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103119702'} This is 100% pure organic argan oil. Nothing added. Excellent quality and effective on our hair and nails. Most of the other brands that claim to be 100% pure argan oil actually add fragrance and preservatives. If you're using this on your face or hair, those extras can cause irritation and clogged pores. My wife and I especially like this pump top dispenser. You can precisely control how much you use. The greatest part,though, has to be the rock bottom price. We've seen this stuff top $20 per ounce. Here you get 4 ounces of cold pressed organic argan oil for 16 bucks. Recommend
<discount provided for evaluation and review Naturally powerful Eyelash Growth Serum for Long Eyelashes From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Contains Stem Cell & Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Dermatologist Lab Tested Lash & Eyebrow Growth Formula, 4 Months Supply, 3.5ml Uptown Cosmeceuticals {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989168', 'Manufacturer': 'RightChoiceMarket'} This serum works. My eyelashes are slightly darker and healthier after only a few applications. I use it at night and, while they aren't longer or thicker, they do look younger. Hopefully the results will last. No irritation or redness so far. Recommend

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: Maintains a strong inclination towards organic and natural personal care products, particularly versatile oils and specialized beauty treatments such as serums for enhancing features like eyelashes.

- **Quality Conscious**: Values 100% pure products without additives, underscoring a commitment to authenticity and purity. This preference continues to reflect a quest for high-performance items, although a recent negative experience with a moisturizer highlights potential quality concerns in new purchases.

- **Pricing Sensitivity**: Continues to seek high value at reasonable price points, evidenced by a willingness to try products with modest ratings. Recent purchases have illustrated a balanced approach between price and performance, though dissatisfaction with specific product functionality may influence future choices.

- **Convenience Features**: Prefers user-friendly designs for ease of use, such as pump dispensers. The user’s routine includes nightly application, and recent issues with a product's dispenser may prompt reevaluation of convenience priorities in product selection.

- **Positive Feedback**: Generally responds well to effective performance and quality, but the recent negative review regarding product functionality suggests growing scrutiny over new products. The reflected frustration with seller communication may also influence future purchasing decisions.

Overall, the user seeks effective, high-quality organic products that deliver value, prioritizing purity, performance, and ease of use while becoming increasingly sensitive to product reliability and seller responsiveness.
